MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton, affecting properties in Somerford, Astbury and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.58AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.04AM on 2nd January 2021.
